# UIToolbar

**Property List Key**

Toolbar visibility and configuration during launch.

## Discussion

When you provide a dictionary for this key, the system displays a toolbar during launch. You can optionally set the dictionary’s [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchScreens/UILaunchScreenDefinitions/UIToolbar/UIImageName] key to define a custom image for the toolbar.

Omit this key if you don’t want to display a toolbar during launch.

## Optional Image

- **UIImageName**: A custom image that replaces the toolbar during launch.

## Border Elements

- **UINavigationBar**: Navigation bar visibility and configuration during launch.
- **UITabBar**: Tab bar visibility and configuration during launch.
